job_tasks.justification: The phrase explicitly mentions 'full-stack software developer', indicating a focus on building and integrating software applications.

job_tasks.phrase: assist in the creation of a dual Web and Mobile application
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core activity of building an application across different platforms (web and mobile).

job_tasks.phrase: employing a two-factor authentication system for enhanced security
job_tasks.justification: Implementing security features like two-factor authentication is a software development task related to building robust applications.
This describes the creation and design of the user interface for a mobile application, which falls under software development.

classification.rationale: The job description focuses entirely on traditional full-stack software development for web and mobile applications, including user authentication and interface design. There is no mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related technologies, which are the core focus of the GenAI Engineer profile.
